extendedInfo.description: IntelliVocab personalizes the English vocabulary learning for competitiveexams like SAT, GRE and GMAT. This app is built by studentsof MIT based on the latest research from MIT Computer Science and WebSemantics Lab.It uses latest machine learning algorithms and web semantic techniquesto collapse billions of possibilities into comprehensible probabilistic profileinformation, in real-time. It completely controls the learning environment,so that you do not have to plan your learning approach. All you need todo is interact. The more you practice, the more it learns about you andfigures out words that are difficult for you. It ensures you achieve the topscore competitive exams.Features:â> 600+ words ( common words from competitive exams ) inthe lite versionâ> Intelligent algorithm to customize the learning experience.â> Key aspect of the app is the practice session.â> Words in practice session are customized based on your expertiselevel, and your comfort level with the words.â> 2 parameters are used to profile users. âExpert Levelâ of the userand âCommitment levelâ of the user. Expert Level â determined based onthe interactions with the words. Commitment Level â determined basedon the interactions with the iPhone App/AI engine.

reviews.title: Helpful, but...
reviews.comment: The practice section doesn\'t work for me. Even after installed and reinstalled... :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Practice doesn\'t work Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Practice doesn\'t work. The text and images are blurry and distorted. But, other than that it seems to work OK.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: some bugs
reviews.comment: - the meaning of \'apostate\' is \'FALSE\' ? - some questions show their answers before replying
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just Plain didn\'t work
reviews.comment: I sent an email and got no response.  Also the app only tested me on 10% of the words.  Very frustrating.  Wouldn\'t recommend.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its wonderful!
reviews.comment: Keeps learning about you as you use the app more. If you make a mistake, the word will come back again and again till you memorize it well. Very engaging.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent app
reviews.comment: Tests work fine, word bank is good but practice doesn\'t work? Htc rezound, ice cream sandwich
reviews.author: Patricia Price

reviews.title: Fair
reviews.comment: Practice session remains blank.  Does not function properly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Practice not working
reviews.comment: The app was recommended and seems great but the practice session does not run for me. Motorola Droid X2 verizon Android 2.3.5
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent App!
reviews.comment: I just started using this app to study for the GRE; it\'s very intuitive and the app will recognize your mistakes. One can take practice tests and learn from them. Very great app, I recommend it to anyone in need of building a better vocabulary or studying for a test
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cool app

reviews.comment: Not all user information is retained between sessions. Keep getting an error when trying to connect to internet

reviews.comment: The concept is good but the implementation is poor. On the nexus s the layout is horrible and the definitions barely stay up long enough to read.
